definition: to go sightseeing/to spend one's leisure time wandering around

sentences.english: A hillbilly was visiting the big city for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 一個鄉下人第一次到大城市遊逛。

sentences.english: New DiscoveryA hillbilly was visiting the big city for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 一個鄉下人第一次到大城市遊逛。

sentences.english: After five years, he returned from his wanderings.
sentences.chinese: 他在外遊逛五年後又回來了。

sentences.english: The mall has become the number one hang-out place for teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 這個購物中心已經成爲青少年出外遊逛的首選之地。

sentences.english: They decided to swan around Italy this summer.
sentences.chinese: 他們決定今年夏天去意大利遊逛。

sentences.english: The boy was running around with a chip on his shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 這男孩東奔西跑，到處遊逛，擺出一副好鬥的姿態。

sentences.english: She's swanning around Europe for the summer.
sentences.chinese: 她一個夏天在歐洲遊逛。

sentences.english: New Discovery A hillbilly was visiting the big city for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 新發現一個鄉下人第一次到大城市遊逛。

sentences.english: Daughter Maria took us around yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天女兒瑪利亞帶我們四周遊逛。

sentences.english: It meant that waking up and exploring on Saturday morning was all the more exciting.
sentences.chinese: 但這也使星期六早上醒來到外面遊逛更有興奮感。

sentences.english: If you see Andy on your travels about town, tell him to ring me.
sentences.chinese: 你在城裏遊逛時要是遇到安迪，告訴他給我打個電話。

sentences.english: She spent the summer swanning around Europe.
sentences.chinese: 她一個夏天在歐洲遊逛。

definition: to eat one's fill/to be full
both the guests and the hosts thoroughly enjoy themselves (idiom)
Yancheng district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
Hong Kong Wetland Park, in Yuen Long, New Territories
pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Shi1 di4 Gong1 yuan2

definition: lit. flower viewing from horseback (idiom); fig. superficial understanding from cursory observation/to make a quick judgment based on inadequate information
Beiguan district of Anyang city 安陽市|安阳市[An1 yang2 shi4], Henan
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2
Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
Arxan county level city, Mongolian Rashaant xot, in Hinggan league 興安盟|兴安盟[Xing1 an1 meng2], east Inner Mongolia
